intro: This level focuses on breaking monoliths into services and using messaging systems.
points: Understand monolith vs microservices at high level.
Benefits of microservices: independent deploy, scaling, tech mix.
Challenges: data consistency, distributed transactions, observability.
Know what message queues and event streams are used for.
Understand sync (HTTP) vs async (queue) communication choices.
